main event: An unidentified celestial object was observed in Panama, resembling a comet, on November 5, 1948.
interesting points: The object was reported to be larger than Venus and emitted a long cone of light,The sighting lasted for approximately 40 minutes until sunrise obscured it,It may have been identified as Comet 1948l, which was discovered shortly before,The object appeared in the southeastern quadrant of the observer's view,The document also includes multiple pages summarizing communications regarding unidentified flying objects.
sighted object: spherical object with a tail resembling a comet
witness description: An operator making a weather report
